job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen, bouwen en onderhouden van data pipelines op ons Snowflake platform, die onze Tableau-rapportages voeden via een semantische laag.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the design, construction, and maintenance of data pipelines, a core component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Overdracht en doorontwikkeling van projecten zoals de GenAI Suite en de Klus Coach (een generatieve AI-assistent voor klanten).
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'GenAI Suite' and 'generatieve AI-assistent' points to the development and refinement of generative AI models and applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Beheer van Dataiku-projecten en ondersteuning van data science-initiatieven.
job_tasks.justification: Managing Dataiku projects and supporting data science initiatives often involves data preparation, transformation, and pipeline management, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Verantwoordelijkheid voor het onderhouden van een Linux-omgeving die cruciaal is voor onze AI-infrastructuur.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining a Linux environment is a fundamental aspect of supporting and deploying software and infrastructure, fitting within software development responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met ons data science team, de IT-afdeling en verschillende business units om schaalbare oplossingen te leveren.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration with various departments to deliver solutions, indicating an understanding of business needs and alignment.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met ons data science team, de IT-afdeling en verschillende business units

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions 'GenAI Suite' and 'generatieve AI-assistent', indicating a focus on generative AI applications. While it includes data engineering tasks like pipeline management with Snowflake, the core emphasis on developing and refining generative AI projects aligns strongly with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile.
